r.d: Complete class for communicating with an NNTP server (this is: the USENET), including: post, view, list, authentication, overview, header manipulation, NNTP commands debugger, etc.
r.n: Merges v0.3.3 and v0.9.4 into one package - The 'Net_NNTP' class from v0.9.x is now called 'Net_NNTP_Realtime'. (heino)
